Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am new here so I hope I am writing this on right place. Ok so I have two mods BDArmory and NKD. Both od them works but when comes to rockets and bombs they do not explode (likes yes they explode but it is normal part explosion). This is first time I use this mods. Please help Thanks

Welcome to the forum @_TAB_, your issue has been moved from KSP discussion to here, our dedicated modded support subforum. One thing that really assists our community of problem solvers is reading through this post and following the instructions for posting your log files:
